_header: Lordings less and more / listeneth all to my lore
Note: For other MSS with a different Prologue, or none at all, see 1593 and 5268.
_description: The ‘Storia Lune’ preceded by a Prologue of 30 lines

BodAsh189.First Lines:
Lordynges lasse and moreLystneth alle to my
                    lore…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…Stele no thyng y counseil theYf thow do ahonged shalt thow
                    be
BodAsh189.Note:
Ends imperfectly in the 23rd day of the month; folios misbound out of
                    order.
BodAsh189.Attributed Title: The xxxti daies of the mone (f. 213v)
